1071758954961747969.text:
Althea's stack for running a decentralized internet 
 Network layer:

- Subnet DAO: @AragonProject 
- Encrypted tunneling software: @WireGuardVPN
- Routing Protocol: Babel (modified)
- @RustLang, #OpenWRT & @Linux
 Governance layer:

- Payments and Governance: @Cosmospic.twitter.com/uY6NIhd97e
